game.name: Puppetry
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This is an ancient-style ensemble game rich in story! Players will take on the role of a puppet in an opera house, where every choice you make could influence your own destiny; those around you; and even the fate of the world. The game features a significant portion of romantic elements.
